resource_dependency.file_upload_api: An endpoint for uploading files with size and type validation.
resource_dependency.database_schema: PostgreSQL schema with tables: reports(report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, description TEXT, evidence_file_path TEXT, submitted_at TIMESTAMP, status ENUM('pending', 'reviewed', 'published')), users(user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, role ENUM('admin', 'moderator', 'anonymous'), created_at TIMESTAMP), forums(forum_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, content TEXT, author_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id), parent_post_id UUID REFERENCES forums(forum_id), created_at TIMESTAMP), articles(article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, summary TEXT, content TEXT, author_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id), published_at TIMESTAMP), search_index(content_type ENUM('report', 'forum', 'article'), content_id UUID, indexed_text TSVECTOR)

function: Implement a whistleblower secrets/awareness website with anonymous reporting functionality
static_description: The main landing page features an azure background with midnight blue UI components. It includes navigation links to Home, Anonymous Reporting, Forum, News & Blog, Search, and Admin Panel. The header contains a logo aligned left and a prominent 'Submit Report Anonymously' button styled in midnight blue.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Submit Report Anonymously' button navigates the user to the anonymous reporting form.
Hovering over navigation items highlights them slightly without changing color scheme.

resource_dependency.file_validation_rules: Max file size: 10MB; Allowed formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOCX

function: Provide a submission form for users to anonymously report insights and upload evidence
static_description: A dedicated form page with azure background and midnight blue-styled input fields for Title, Description, and Evidence Upload. A large midnight blue Submit button is present below the form.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the Submit button sends form data via POST request to /api/reports/submit after client-side validation.
Selecting a file populates the file input field and triggers immediate client-side validation against defined rules.

resource_dependency.threaded_forum_schema: Database table: forums(forum_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, content TEXT, author_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id), parent_post_id UUID REFERENCES forums(forum_id), created_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Include a discussion forum allowing users to post, reply, and engage in threaded conversations
static_description: Forum page displays a list of top-level threads in card format on azure background with midnight blue headers and borders. Each thread shows title, excerpt, timestamp, and number of replies.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a thread expands it to show full content and nested replies. Clicking 'Reply' opens a reply form beneath the selected post.
Scrolling loads additional threads dynamically if pagination is enabled.

resource_dependency.search_results_schema: Database view combining indexed content from reports, forums, and articles

function: Integrate a search functionality enabling keyword and topic-based content discovery
static_description: A search bar positioned prominently in the header with azure background and midnight blue border. Below the bar, a results section lists matching items categorized under Reports, Forums, and Articles when active.

interaction_and_states.description: Typing initiates live suggestions based on partial matches after 3 characters.
Pressing Enter submits the query and redirects to a results page listing relevant entries across all sections.

resource_dependency.news_blog_schema: Database table: articles(article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, summary TEXT, content TEXT, author_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id), published_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Develop a news and blog section displaying latest articles and updates
static_description: News/Blog section presents cards with azure background and midnight blue accents. Each card shows article title, summary, publication date, and a Read More link.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a card or 'Read More' navigates to the full article page.
Scrolling to bottom triggers loading more articles if available.

function: Design the website with an azure background and midnight blue UI components
static_description: Entire site uses azure (#F0FFFF) as base background color. All buttons, headers, cards, and interactive elements use midnight blue (#191970) styling consistently throughout pages.

function: Create a frontend that dynamically fetches all content through backend APIs
static_description: Frontend application built with framework capable of making HTTP requests to backend endpoints. Content areas such as homepage feed, forum threads, and blog posts load dynamically upon render.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon initial load, frontend makes concurrent GET requests to respective API endpoints to populate dynamic sections.

resource_dependency.postgres_integration_library: pg or similar Node.js PostgreSQL client library

function: Build a backend system connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
static_description: Backend server configured to read environment variables for PostgreSQL connection parameters. Uses standard ORM or raw SQL queries to interact with database.

resource_dependency.install_script_command: "install:all": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm install\" \"cd backend && npm install\""

function: Configure package.json with 'npm run install:all' script to install frontend and backend dependencies
static_description: Root-level package.json file defines custom script named 'install:all' which executes dependency installation commands for both frontend and backend directories concurrently.

interaction_and_states.description: Running `npm run install:all` from root directory installs packages for both projects simultaneously.

resource_dependency.dev_server_commands: ["cd frontend && npm run dev", "cd backend && npm run dev"]

function: Configure package.json with 'npm run dev' script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
static_description: Root-level package.json includes a 'dev' script that utilizes a concurrency tool to launch development servers for frontend and backend applications together.

interaction_and_states.description: Executing `npm run dev` starts both frontend and backend development environments side-by-side.

function: Ensure all data including reports, forum posts, and articles are stored persistently in the database
static_description: All submitted reports, forum discussions, published articles, user roles, and search indexes reside in PostgreSQL tables structured according to predefined schemas.

resource_dependency.auth_system_schema: users(user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, role ENUM('admin', 'moderator', 'anonymous'), session_token TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Implement user authentication system to support anonymous submissions while maintaining security
static_description: Authentication mechanism assigns temporary tokens to anonymous reporters during submission flow. Tokens do not associate personal information but allow tracking within session scope.

interaction_and_states.description: At beginning of anonymous report process, frontend calls auth API to obtain short-lived token used for subsequent secure operations.

resource_dependency.upload_validation_config: Maximum size: 10MB; Supported MIME types: image/jpeg, image/png, application/pdf, application/msword, application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document

function: Enable file upload capability for evidence submission with appropriate validation and storage
static_description: Submission form includes a file picker element that accepts documents and images up to 10MB. Files are uploaded separately before finalizing the report submission.

interaction_and_states.description: User selects a file which undergoes client-side checks for format and size prior to upload initiation.
Selected file uploads asynchronously to designated folder path with unique identifier assigned for reference in report record.

function: Provide moderation tools for administrators to manage reports, forum content, and published articles
static_description: Admin dashboard accessible only to authenticated moderators/admins. Displays grids/lists of pending/approved content with inline action buttons per item.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking Approve/Reject/Delete/Edit modifies corresponding entry status or content directly in database.

resource_dependency.full_text_search_index: PostgreSQL tsvector column indexing combined content fields
resource_dependency.search_query_builder: SQL-based query generator supporting multi-table UNION searches

function: Optimize search functionality to index and retrieve content across reports, forums, and blog posts
static_description: Search engine leverages PostgreSQLâ€™s full-text search capabilities. Indexed content spans multiple domains ensuring fast retrieval regardless of source.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitted search term gets parsed into weighted tsquery expression matched against precomputed vectors in unified index.
